ISSUE.TITLE: Admin area. Menu item "Measures" wrong css class
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Just pulled the latest changes from the develop branch. Opening the "Shipping" menu item at the right side, shows another list of menu items. All menu items start with a simple circle, except for "Measures" that starts with a filled circle. See image: ![3_90_menu_admin](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9657173/21457513/35851120-c930-11e6-8a07-7ae399ea2141.png) Following code: `` Should be changed to: `` Very small issue, but thought it was worth mentioning.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: " Customer has one of these products in the cart" plugin should use "AdminAreaSettings.PopupGridPageSize" setting

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1995 Admin area. Menu item "Measures" had wrong CSS class
